description.value: This codeSystem contains codes which specify the technical format of a document. Each code provides sufficient information to allow any potential document consumer to know if it will be able to process the document. The codes are sufficiently specific to ensure processing/display by identifying a document encoding, structure and template. For example, formatCodes can be used in the FHIR DocumentReference resource to characterize the document being referenced.
